attributes.action: Remove Elizabeth Mary Truss from her role as Minister for Women and Equalities
attributes.additional_details: As a woman and part of the LGBTQ community these reforms will have a consequence on equality.  Rather than moving towards a society which holds equality for all it feels that it is a step back for the LGBT community.  Due to this it is evident that Liz Truss is not a suitable candidate for her current role.
attributes.background: Liz Truss has recently indicated she is attempting to implement same sex spaces and reform on the Gender Recognition Act.  This will have a negative impact on the transgender community as it will restrict their freedom.  Liz has also indicated that trans people under 18 will not receive medical care

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for Cabinet Ministers to be sacked.

You may wish to sign these petitions instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/318025
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/318175
